## BufferProps interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BufferProps extends WithContext 
```
<b>Extends:</b> WithContext

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [size](./webgl.bufferprops.size.md) | number | The buffers size in bytes. |
|  [target?](./webgl.bufferprops.target.md) | [BufferBindingPoint](./webgl.bufferbindingpoint.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Enum specifying the binding point that the buffer will be bound to when bind() is called. |
